name: PC Mama
description: This is a usable Computer re-selling website.
technologies: React.js, React Router, Tailwind CSS,Daisy UI, NodeJs , ExpressJs , Firebase Authentication,MongoDB
features: •User can sign up themselves as a seller or buyer.• Buyer can be able to add product to their cart and view their all orders on the dashboard. • Seller Can be able to Add product and view their adding product on the dashboard.• Admin can be able to see all users, delete user, add admin.

name: Dr Shetty Chamber
description: This is a Doctor service review website
technologies: React.js, React Router, Tailwind CSS,Daisy UI, NodeJs , ExpressJs , Firebase Authentication,MongoDB
features: •In this website user can login with Google & Email.• Users can write a review for treatment.• Showing Course Details with more information.• Users can be able to add treatment and edit their review.

name: EduSmart BD
description: This is a Usable Computer Re-Selling Website.
